alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Newton; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:23AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam, northeastern Butts, Jasper and southeastern Newton Counties through NOON EDT... At 1123 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over North Alcovy, or 11 miles northwest of Monticello, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Mansfield, Shady Dale, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Worthville, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, Calvin, Farrar, Eudora, North Alcovy, McElheneys Crossroads, Adgateville and Stark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
